column2: ENGLISH
Regional Bureaucracy
This character's seat of government is established in the permanent capital of their state, allowing them to take advantage of an established bureaucracy.
Federal Bureaucracy
This character's seat of government is established in the permanent capital of their state, allowing them to take advantage of an established bureaucracy.
Regional Capital

This system has been designated as the Federal Capital District for its region - it is considered to be the exclusive property of the federal government, and will be automatically granted to a new government when it takes power.
Federal Capital

This system has been designated as the Federal Capital District for its empire - it is considered to be the exclusive property of the federal government, and will be automatically granted to a new government when it takes power.
Designate [Root.Capital.GetName] as the [Root.Capital.Kingdom.GetAdjective] Capital
Establishing a permanent seat of the [Root.Capital.Kingdom.GetAdjective] government in the [Root.Capital.GetName] System would greatly assist in the administration of the state.
Designate [Root.Capital.GetName] as the [Root.Capital.Empire.GetAdjective] Capital
Establishing a permanent seat of the [Root.Capital.Empire.GetAdjective] government in the [Root.Capital.GetName] System would greatly assist in the administration of the state.
You have not already designated a regional capital.\n
You have not already designated a federal capital.\n

The [Root.GetName] System can no longer serve as the established capital of the [Root.Kingdom.GetFullName], and many of the administrative agencies that were established here are now being dissolved or dispersed.

The [From.GetName] System can no longer serve as the established capital of the [From.Kingdom.GetFullName], and many of the administrative agencies that were established there are now being dissolved or dispersed.

The [Root.GetName] System can no longer serve as the established capital of the [Root.Empire.GetFullName], and many of the administrative agencies that were established here are now being dissolved or dispersed.

The [From.GetName] System can no longer serve as the established capital of the [From.Empire.GetFullName], and many of the administrative agencies that were established there are now being dissolved or dispersed.
will become the permanent capital of the [This.Kingdom.GetFullName].
The [Root.Kingdom.GetFullName] has established a permanent capital in the [Root.GetName] System.
will become the permanent capital of the [This.Empire.GetFullName].
The [Root.Empire.GetFullName] has established a permanent capital in the [Root.GetName] System.
